value.title: DAX Fridays #155: How to set default value of a slicer in Power BI

value.title: DAX Fridays! #81: CALCULATETABLE
value.excerpt: In todays video we are going to cover the DAX function CALCULATETABLE.  CALCULATETABLE allows you to create virtual tables that you can then filter using multiple conditions and use that table to make further calculations.   What is the difference between CALCULATETABLE and CALCULATE?  The first one

value.excerpt: You can export data or download data out of Power BI in many different ways and depending on the source, you can schedule refresh those data dumps too. During this session, we will cover the following things: • Real-life example where we need Cumulative Sum 00:21

value.title: Forecasting in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can forecast our data in Power BI. We will be discussing which visualization supports forecasting in Power BI. value.title: Native Query: Be careful when using in Power BI
value.excerpt: Patrick looks at native query and why you should be careful when using it in Power BI.
